short_summary: Request for Proposal to Supply Heavy Logistics Vehicle Wheeled (HLVW) spares and hardware to the Department of National Defence
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items listed below.  The delivery is requested at 25 CFSD Montreal, Quebec and 7 CFSD Edmonton, Alberta by 90 days within contract award.
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: Heavy Logistics Vehicle Wheeled (HLVW) – Spares - Hardware

**Reference:** cb-507-10666339
**Solicitation Number:** W8486-259688/A
**Tender Status:** Expired

**Procurement Category:** Goods
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Scope of Work:**
The Department of National Defence invites proposals for the procurement of Heavy Logistics Vehicle Wheeled (HLVW) spares and hardware. The proposed contract includes the delivery of the following items:

* 60 units of Seal, Plain (GSIN: N5330, NSN: 12-325-3179), Part No.: 0750 111 114, Unit of Issue: Each, to be delivered to 25 CFSD Montreal, Quebec.
* 20 units of Seal, Plain (GSIN: N5330, NSN: 12-325-3179), Part No.: 0750 111 114, Unit of Issue: Each, to be delivered to 7 CFSD Edmonton, Alberta.
* 15 units of O-Ring (GSIN: N5331, NSN: 21-906-1405), Part No.: 815 00 13 0068, Unit of Issue: Each, to be delivered to 25 CFSD Montreal, Quebec.
* 10 units of O-Ring (GSIN: N5331, NSN: 21-906-1405), Part No.: 815 00 13 0068, Unit of Issue: Each, to be delivered to 7 CFSD Edmonton, Alberta.
* 200 units of Brake Drum (GSIN: N2530, NSN: 21-906-3289), Part No.: 991 12 34 0006, Unit of Issue: Each, to be delivered to 25 CFSD Montreal, Quebec.
* 100 units of Brake Drum (GSIN: N2530, NSN: 21-906-3289), Part No.: 991 12 34 0006, Unit of Issue: Each, to be delivered to 7 CFSD Edmonton, Alberta.
